original_text: And leaping up, he stood and began to walk, and entered the temple with them, walking and leaping and praising God.
korean_text: 뛰어 서서 걸으며 그들과 함께 성전으로 들어가면서 걷기도 하고 뛰기도 하며 하나님을 찬송하니

sentences.original_text: he stood and began to walk,
and entered the temple with them,
walking and leaping and praising God.
